Classification: Documentary
Genre: Children | Current Events | Financial/Business | Interview | Teens
Status: TBD/On The Bubble
Network: BBC THREE ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Tuesdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: June 26, 2012
Ended: July 10, 2012

Stacey Dooley presents a 3 part series exploring the effects of the economic crisis for the youth of 3 different countries.
